metadata.description: Custom skills and plugins for the team

plugins.name: example-skill
plugins.description: An example skill to demonstrate the plugin structure

plugins.name: publication-figures
plugins.description: Generate publication-quality scientific figures with matplotlib. Supports scatter, line, bar, dual-axis, log-scale plots with error bars, colorbars, insets. Includes 6 colorblind-safe color palettes and optional SEM image processing.

plugins.name: ax-bayesian-optimization
plugins.description: Bayesian optimization partner for materials science experiments using Meta Ax. Guides researchers through iterative optimization of material properties, formulations, and process parameters with full git documentation.
